title: Journalism will break from the hero narrative
description: Journalism must embrace complexity to have an abundant future. Our information infrastructure is built on the volcanoes of capitalism — a system that demands flattening, that rewards the derivative, that incentivizes stories designed to polarize rather than illuminate. This flattening doesn’t just distort our work; it enables erasure and makes authoritarianism’s job easier. Authoritarianism thrives...
